backend/main.mo: Motoko canister defining user profiles with access control, plus read-only phone and crypto report lookups.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping features to their files, components, tests, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing various frontend files, components, and configurations.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles defining OKLCH color tokens, light/dark themes, and global layout variables.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point configuring metadata, icons, manifest, and loading the main React bundle.
frontend/PHASE3A_READONLY_FRONTEND_NOCHA: Documentation confirming Phase 3a adds a read‑only canister requiring no frontend code changes.
frontend/PRODUCTION_BUILD_VERIFICATION.m: Deployment checklist covering routing, consent gate, branding, antifraud analysis, multilingual content, and lookup verification.
frontend/public/404.html: SPA fallback page that redirects known routes back to the app shell.
frontend/public/data/public-contact-look: Static dataset providing public contact lookup entries with source info and timestamps.
frontend/public/manifest.webmanifest: Defines the PWA manifest for AntiFraud, including metadata, colors, start URL, and icons.
frontend/public/service-worker.js: Implements a service worker with precaching, cache cleanup, and a network-first fetch strategy.
frontend/PWA_WEBAPK_ANDROID_TEST.md: Step‑by‑step checklist for validating Android Chrome WebAPK installation behavior.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app that sets up providers, routing, consent gating, and service worker registration.
frontend/src/backend.idl.ts: Defines the backend canister interface with a single analyzeText function.
frontend/src/components/AdvancedContactL: Component that validates phone/email input, performs antifraud analysis, fetches public info, and caches results with offline support.
Displays antifraud analysis and public contact info with risk indicators and offline/cache notices.
frontend/src/components/AppLayout.tsx: Provides global page layout with navigation, header, mobile menu, language selector, and auth controls.
frontend/src/components/AuthControl.tsx: Handles Internet Identity login/logout and displays user profile menu when authenticated.
frontend/src/components/CollaborativeRes: Shows community-based risk score, categories, and details for collaborative lookup results with error handling.
frontend/src/components/ConsentGateModal: Modal requiring users to accept cookies and terms before proceeding, with navigation to terms/privacy and enforced confirmation checks.
frontend/src/components/DashboardQuickAc: Empty or placeholder file with no implemented content.
frontend/src/components/InstallButton.ts: Button triggering PWA installation and showing an alert if installation is not eligible.
frontend/src/components/LanguageSelector: Dropdown allowing users to switch application languages using the i18n provider.
frontend/src/components/PwaInstallAction: Small button triggering PWA installation without eligibility messaging.
frontend/src/components/ReportSubmission: Dialog for submitting fraud reports with validation, rate limiting, and success/error handling.
frontend/src/components/StructuredAnalys: Card displaying structured fraud analysis details including risk, explanation, recommendations, and source links.
User profile panel showing identity info, search history management, and logout option.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook creating and managing a backend actor tied to user identity, refreshing queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdvancedContactLoo: Hook managing localStorage-backed cache for phone/email lookup results with add, get, and clear functions.
frontend/src/hooks/useAntiFraudActors.ts: Initializes and stores main, extra, and reports canister actors using the current identity and logs a readiness report once.
frontend/src/hooks/useConsentGate.ts: Manages a localStorage-backed consent flag requiring users to accept terms before proceeding.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides context and hooks for managing Internet Identity authentication and loading stored identities.
frontend/src/hooks/useOfflineStatus.ts: Tracks the browser’s online/offline status via window events.
frontend/src/hooks/useUserProfile.ts: Loads, saves, and clears per-identity user history from local storage and exposes history manipulation helpers.
frontend/src/i18n/I18nProvider.tsx: Provides language state, persistence, and translation access through context.
frontend/src/i18n/translations.ts: Defines the full Portuguese translation dictionary for the app UI.
frontend/src/ic/actors.ts: Creates HTTP agents and typed actor instances for main, extra, and reports canisters on IC mainnet.
frontend/src/ic/canisterIds.ts: Defines and exports static canister IDs and a helper to retrieve them.
frontend/src/ic/idl/extra.idl.ts: Candid interface for the extra canister exposing phone and crypto report queries.
frontend/src/ic/idl/main.idl.ts: Candid interface for the main canister providing text analysis.
frontend/src/ic/idl/reports.idl.ts: Candid interface for the reports canister including submitting and querying fraud reports.
frontend/src/ic/readinessReport.ts: Generates and logs a readiness report showing canister IDs and whether each actor and method is available.
frontend/src/index.css: Configures Tailwind layers and defines light/dark theme CSS variables with accessibility and mobile tweaks.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/DocumentationPage.tsx: Renders a documentation page with translated sections and triggers PDF generation.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Implements the main verification UI with tabs for analyzing messages, email, phone, and crypto data.
frontend/src/pages/HowItWorksPage.tsx: Displays expandable sections explaining how each verification method works using localized text.
frontend/src/pages/MissionPage.tsx: Shows mission-related sections like vision, core mission, impact, and values with i18n and SEO setup.
frontend/src/pages/PrivacyPage.tsx: Renders the Privacy Policy page with SEO metadata and multiple text sections using translations. Includes a helper to safely render translation paragraphs with fallbacks.
frontend/src/pages/TermsPage.tsx: Displays the Terms and Conditions page with SEO setup and sectioned content sourced from translations. Uses a defensive paragraph renderer similar to the Privacy page.
frontend/src/pwa/install.ts: Implements PWA installation handling by capturing the beforeinstallprompt event and exposing a function to trigger the deferred install prompt. Tracks and resets install state to prevent duplicate prompts.
frontend/src/router/useSimpleRouter.ts: Provides a lightweight custom router using shared module state, browser history, and a custom navigation event. Exposes currentRoute and a navigate function to update the path.
frontend/src/utils/antifraudTextNormaliz: Offers text normalization for accent- and case-insensitive matching plus utilities to detect and extract keywords in normalized text. Used for antifraud keyword heuristics.
frontend/src/utils/contactInputHeuristic: Implements contact-type detection, normalization, and validation for phone and email inputs with multilingual error messages. Provides heuristics to classify and sanitize user-entered contact data.
Builds a structured documentation object by combining fixed content with Portuguese translation fields. Aggregates institutional, mission, terms, and privacy sections into a unified documentation format.
frontend/src/utils/emailHeuristics.ts: Runs deterministic checks on emails to flag suspicious domains, TLDs, typosquatting, and random patterns. Returns a simple safe/flagged result with the reason.
frontend/src/utils/generateDocumentation: Builds AntiFraud documentation text content and triggers a client-side download as a .txt file.
frontend/src/utils/localRateLimit.ts: Implements local cooldown tracking in localStorage to rate-limit submissions for one minute.
frontend/src/utils/messageHeuristics.ts: Performs lightweight client-side scam detection by scoring keywords, URLs, crypto patterns, and formatting anomalies.
frontend/src/utils/publicContactLookup.t: Loads a local JSON dataset and returns public metadata matches for phone or email contacts.
frontend/src/utils/seo.ts: Sets page title and meta description dynamically for SPA routes with AntiFraud branding.
frontend/src/utils/structuredFraudAnalys: Provides deterministic, language-specific fraud risk evaluation with structured explanations and recommendations.
frontend/src/utils/translateBackendResul: Translates common Portuguese scam-analysis terms into other languages using a dictionary-based replacer.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Retrieves, stores, persists, and clears URL parameters, supporting both query and hash routing.
frontend/src/utils/userProfileStorage.ts: Manages user profiles in localStorage, including analysis history and language preferences.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind config enabling dark mode, content scanning, extended OKLCH color system, typography, animations, and plugins for container queries and animations.
project_state.json: Project state metadata detailing current release, architecture notes, known issues, and existing feature records for the AntiFraud app.
